__e: There's nothing I want more than to find a way back to where we were, but...
There is nothing I want more.
Iz, there isn't anything in this universe that I want more.
I'll just sleep better knowing that he's off the streets... and on the executioner's block.
'Cause you want this more than anything in the world. And I wanna give it to you.
Iz, there isn't anything in this universe that I want more.
As much as I want to, I can't live in your book anymore.
I could stay with you now, and I want that so much. But chances are I wouldn't make it, because I'm not strong enough.
You know, I bend over backwards trying to be everything you want, but the one thing I can't be is young again, Joe.
Maybe you don't wish for me to bear you a child.
Desire me, for my body, like you desire him.
You want this to be the shark. That doesn't mean it is.
I asked what you wanted and needed.
It doesn't mean that some small part of you doesn't want to, does it?
You made a checklist. This has everything on your checklist.
I would make sure you have anything you want for the rest of your life
Because if you don't, you won't be getting what you want anytime soon.
Josh, if you're really here, then I know you'll want what is best for us, for all of us.
No matter how much you want it, you can't turn the clock back.
You know what they say, "dress for the job you want, not the job you have".
You're entitled to three wishes--no more, no less.
